item.title: EVM-Based Blockchains Payment Gateway
item.description:
In this post we are going to understand how a basic payment gateway in Ethereum Virtual Machine based blockchain would work.


As you migh know the main langauge to write an Ethereum smart contract is Solidity so we’re gonna use Solidity.





note that the payment should be stored in database off-chain, otherwise we cannot track what happened to the transaction.


now let’s dive in what happens on-chain, how should we control the flow.

item.title: What Is It Like to Be a Programmer in Iran?
item.description:
I am Iranian, and I live in Tehran, the capital of Iran. As you might know, Iran is located in the Middle East, and we speak Persian.


I have a confession to make; being and becoming a developer in Iran isnâ€™t easy; there are numerous obstacles in the way.

The Early Stages: Introduction to Programming

I was introduced to programming by one of my relatives who worked as a network administrator at BMI (Bank Melli Iran). Before that, when I was in primary school, one of our teachers taught us how to change operating systems and introduced us to various hardware components in a PC. In 2014, during my first year of junior high school (In Iran, the education system follows K-12), I wrote my first line of code.


And thus, my journey began.
